data.actual_result: It will say the user is typing for about two (2) seconds even though they are not
data.expected_result: You will open up the DM, and it will only say the user is typing if they actually are
data.short_description: Says that a user is typing (when they are not) in DMs for a couple seconds when you open discord
data.steps_to_repro: - switch to the DM you will be receiving a message from - close discord - receive the DM while discord is closed - open the DM you received while discord was closed (also works if you quickly switch to that DM after opening discord)
